main event: On 6 November 1957, a white elongated object was observed moving rapidly at high altitude over Bellmore, L.I., New York.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 15 minutes,The object was described as baseball-shaped and white,Prior investigation suggested it might have been a missile test vehicle,The observation was made visually from the ground,The eyewitness was a 27-year-old individual.
